name: Kinky Boost
description: Compact and highly versatile boost pedal inspired by the preamp circuit of the legendary Maestro Echoplex EP-3, a tape delay unit famously used by guitarists like Jimmy Page, Eddie Van Halen, and Eric Johnson. Introduced by Xotic Effects, the pedal delivers up to +20dB of clean, multi-dimensional boost with shimmering highs and lows, making it a favorite for enhancing tone without adding distortion.
